name: Sales Analytics MCP
description: Access sales data including revenue, customer information, and transaction history. Perfect for sales forecasting and customer analysis.

name: HR & People Management MCP
description: Manage employee data, people records, and organizational structure. Query employee records, roles, and people information.

name: Inventory & Warehouse MCP
description: Track inventory levels, stock movements, and warehouse data. Monitor product availability and supply chain information.

name: Purchasing & Supply Chain MCP
description: Access purchasing data including suppliers, purchase orders, and supplier transactions. Ideal for supply chain management.

name: Complete Business Operations MCP
description: Full access to all business data including sales, purchasing, warehouse, and application data. Comprehensive business intelligence.
